languagetool-desc:
{{desc|name=LanguageTool|url=https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:LanguageTool}}

Note: "LanguageTool" is the name of the server software that does the error checking, and also the name of the MediaWiki extension that connects VisualEditor to that software.
languagetool-toolbar-item-title: The title of the toolbar element that starts spelling and grammar checking.
